creator: adrian.bala@gmail.com
text:
Author: Dominik Walczak
Task added by: Adrian Bala

Would be useful to have an opportunity to move by drag&drop more than one element from test plan at once.

For now it is possible to drag&drop just one element, i.e. http request and place it somewhere in the tree.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
This is already implemented.

Just make sure you retain the selection by starting the drag before releasing Shift or Control (otherwise only the last item will be selected).
